personal.name: Parth Dholariya
personal.bio: Hi, I’m Parth Dholariya, a passionate Software Developer dedicated to building efficient, scalable, and user-focused solutions. I enjoy transforming ideas into reality using clean code and modern technologies. Whether it’s crafting seamless user interfaces or developing powerful backend systems, I love solving problems through technology.

projects.title: AI Email Reply Assistant
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered email auto-reply assistant using Spring Boot and Google Gemini API, integrated with a custom browser extension to generate context-aware replies with a single click.

projects.title: Journal App
projects.description: Created secure REST APIs with JWT-based authentication for a personal journal application. Implemented full CRUD operations for journal entries with comprehensive testing.

projects.title: ShareBite – Surplus Food Management
projects.description: Developing a food donation platform using Flutter and Firebase to connect surplus food providers with those in need. Implementing user roles, real-time data management, and seamless food donation workflow.

projects.title: Job Portal Web Application
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive job portal web application with separate modules for Admin, Job Seekers, and Employers. Features include job posting, application management, and user profile updates.
features: Job seeker profile and application system

achievements: Completed internship where I got hands-on experience in PHP web development.
Worked on creating and improving dynamic web applications using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

highlights: Strong foundation in computer science fundamentals

certifications.title: Generative AI Mastermind
certifications.description: Completed a comprehensive Generative AI program focused on prompt engineering, practical AI tools, and real-world applications.

certifications.title: Software Engineering Job Simulation
certifications.description: Completed hands-on software engineering simulation focusing on debugging, code improvement, and enterprise-level development practices.
